Here's the official trailer (+ poster) for Apple TV's series Berlin ER, direct from Apple TV's YouTube:

Managing a chaotic emergency room in the toughest & most overcrowded hospital in Berlin is no small task for the young Dr. Parker, who is seeking a fresh start in the big city after her private life implodes in Munich. When she tries to implement necessary reforms, she's confronted with resistance from underpaid, ill-equipped and chronically fatigued hospital staff who only survive with an indispensable dose of black humor. But in the face of an increasingly merciless healthcare system, the battered team must put aside their differences and pull together to save lives. Berlin ER, also known as KRANK Berlin in German, is a series created by Viktor Jakovleski & Samuel Jefferson. With writing by Korbinian Hamberger, Lisa van Brakel, Viktor Jakovleski, Samuel Jefferson. With episodes directed by Fabian MÃ¶hrke and Alex Schaad. Made by Violet Pictures & Real Film Berlin. Executive produced by Alexis von Wittgenstein and Henning Kamm. Apple debuts the Berlin ER series available on Apple TV+ starting February 26th, 2025. Intense?
